title: Conflict between Judaism and Christianity - Collection 2
description:
Conflict between Judaism and Christianity - Collection 2:

We have 18 titles in this upload.

-  Anti-Judaism in Early Christianity, Vol. 1 - Paul and the Gospels, Ed. by Peter Richardson (1986)

-  Anti-Judaism in Early Christianity, Vol. 2 - Separation and Polemic, Ed. by Stephen Wilson (1986)

-  Biale - Blood and Belief (2007)

-  Bibliowicz - Jews and Gentiles in the Early Jesus Movement; an Unintended Journey (2013)

-  Blaubaum - Judaism & Christianity; Their Original Identity and Subsequent Divergence from Each Other (1887)

-  Dalman - Christianity and Judaism; an Essay (1901)

-  Garcia (Ed.) - Mel Gibson's Passion and Philosophy; the Cross, the Questions, the Controversy (2004)

-  Glover - The Conflict of Religions in Early Roman Empire (1909)

-  Klepper - The Insight of Unbelievers; Nicholas of Lyra and Christian Reading of Jewish Text in the Later Middle Ages (2007)

-  Luomanen - Recovering Jewish-Christian Sects and Gospels (2012)

-  Luther - The Jews and Their Lies (1543)

-  Marissen - Lutheranism, Anti-Judaism, and Bach's St. John Passion (1998)

-  Nitenberg - Anti-Judaism; the Western Tradition (2013)

-  Pagels - The Origin of Satan (1996)

-  Samuel - You Gentiles (1995)

-  Sandgren - Vines Intertwined; a History of Jews and Christians from the Babylonian Exile to the Advent of Islam (2010)

-  Weiss-Rosmarin - Judaism and Christianity; the Differences (1943)

-  Wise - A Defense of Judaism versus Proselytizing Christianity (1889)
